description: How to caulk shower niche miter joints…I use Latasil 100% silicone. The secret is to apply a lot of pressure with the DAP caulking tool and index finger. I like Latasil because it’s the best silicone to tool and color matches my grout 👍🏽🔥#tile #tileshower #bathroomremodel #silicone
title: How to Caulk Shower Niche Miter Joints - #shorts #homerepairtutor
